name: Furry Love 2
description:
General


Furry Love 2 is an Entertaining Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Exciting Mini-Games with the Attractive Furry Girls 🦊

Beautiful Furry Girls, Amazing Atmosphere, Great Music, 56+ Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks.
Great for relaxing after a hard day at work. Join us!

Unique Features


  • Seven Game Modes
  • Dynamic Gameplay and Various Difficulty Levels
  • 56+ Wonderful Levels with Full HD Furry Artwork
  • Amazing Atmosphere & Great Music
  • 100 Achievements
  • Cheat Code to Complete the Level - "LOVE"

Contact - darkfantasy.gamedev@gmail.com

Game Modes


  • Furry Tron
  • Furball
  • Furrman
  • Furry Cutter
  • Catch the Furry!
  • Puzzle
  • Rock, Paper, Scissors
